member.name: M:TokenApi11062024.Controllers.AuthController.Token(TokenApi11062024.Model.Binding.LoginBinding)
member.summary: Authenticates a user and generates an access token and a refresh token.
member.param: The login binding model containing the user's credentials.
member.returns: A Task resulting in a containing the access and refresh tokens for the user. Returns null if authentication fails.
member.remarks: This method attempts to authenticate a user using their username and password. If authentication succeeds, it generates a JWT access token and a refresh token for the user. The refresh token is stored in the user's record along with its expiry time, and both tokens are returned in a TokenViewModel. If authentication fails, the method returns null.

member.summary: Generates a random string to be used as a refresh token.
